short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close tabs by middle-clicking anywhere on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install the application without any configuration, and you will be able to close tabs by middle-clicking anywhere on the page.

It is very easy to use it.

Note: NOT WORK on pages with 'chrome://' or 'google.com' URLs.
